snippet: After childhood false starts, adolescent indifference and a lengthy effort to conceal the deficiency as an adult, the time had come for a transportation reporter to learn how to ride a bike.
lead_paragraph: After childhood false starts, adolescent indifference and a lengthy effort to conceal the deficiency as an adult, the time had come for a transportation reporter to learn how to ride a bike.

headline.main: A Reporter Learns to Ride a Bicycle as an Adult
